Name: azure_cpupercentage_average;azure_cpupercentage_count;azure_cpupercentage_maximum;azure_cpupercentage_minimum;azure_cpupercentage_total
Description: Average of the CPU percentages consumed by individual Container Groups in this Scale Set.

Name: azure_cpuusage_average;azure_cpuusage_count;azure_cpuusage_maximum;azure_cpuusage_minimum;azure_cpuusage_total
Description: Average of the CPU utilizations in millicores consumed by Container Groups in this Scale Set.

Name: azure_memorypercentage_average;azure_memorypercentage_count;azure_memorypercentage_maximum;azure_memorypercentage_minimum;azure_memorypercentage_total
Description: Average of the memory percentages consumed ((usedMemory/allocatedMemory) * 100) by Container Groups in this Scale Set.

Name: azure_memoryusage_average;azure_memoryusage_count;azure_memoryusage_maximum;azure_memoryusage_minimum;azure_memoryusage_total
Description: Total memory used by all the Container Groups in this Scale Set.
